reviews.review_text: Always organized and helpfull team. It is smaller store comiare with other home depot stores with almost all their products. It is a Little boutique home depot.

I love this store! Whenever I ve come here for whatever product I find the staff very helpful, the prices are much cheaper than other places and they have a huge selection. Now that the garden works store in North Vancouver is closed I came here and discovered that they have the BEST  prices on their huge selection of pots, flowers, soil etc. They do need to change their entrance though. For those with disabilities it s a huge pain to go all the way around to one entrance. It makes more sense to have multiple entrances to welcome people into the store.

They have amazing customer service here. Joy was very kind in helping me find what I needed and was able to answer the questions I had. She was very patient and friendly checking me out at the self checkout area as well, hope to see her again.

I had a great experience at Home Depot thanks to Reza! I was unsure about what to buy, but Reza provided excellent guidance on products and their uses. I really appreciate the help and knowledge shared. Thank you so much!

I like Home Depot. Their prices are fair and the selection is good. But what stands out are the staff, many are retired tradesmen who are able to.provide accurate knowledge and guidance. Location is good with ample parking in the lot.

This store delivers the highest level of customer care.  Matt from the paint department is a Prince serving customers and he makes us feel like a king.  Reza is very professional,  attentive and committed to keeping customers happy.  Im grateful to shop here

Im a loyal customer of Home Depot.  This branch is a mini store because the local authority doesnt allow them to sell lumber, drywall etc.  However they still have most things. Of great importance is the quality of the team.  Matt is a man with no hair but he has a million good qualities of a gentleman and delivers exceptional customer service.  He walks and talks like a member of the Royal family.  Heiter is a kind and attentive  cashier who is mindful and caring for the company. Salvatore knows everything about everything in construction,  or it appears that way to customers.  He helps and guides equally well in tools, electrical, plumbing, tiling.  Its a pleasure to meet him. Thank you Home Depot.

Your friendly home improvement destination in West Vancouver with one-stop convenience. Centrally located at the Main Street intersection across from Simons, Home Depot - Park Royal carries a comprehensive array of quality products for all aspects of your home renovations conceived, and yet to be imagined. Update:  20th July 2022 Seasonal Outdoor Garden Centre: Home Depot at Park Royal Village has an Outdoor Garden Centre (open approx. early-April - September) which is located behind the store building.  Ample parking is available, in addition to carts for loading up flowers, plants, ceramic pots and supplies. I hadnt made a visit to H.D. Garden Centre since before Covid struck 2 years ago, but needed to replace an area of flower bed in back garden which had been planted, but which slugs had completely obliterated. The July Clearance has already begun but there are still very good quantities of ornamental Annuals, Perennials and Shrubs as well as a wide array of supplies (e.g., soil, fertilizer, slug bait [ yes, lol ;) ], patio ceramic pots and more) to be had. Awesome location, top-notch store and people. Highly recommended.

I had an outstanding experience at Home Depot in West Vancouver. Meena and Ivan exceeded my expectations by going the extra mile to address my concerns. It was truly surprising to encounter such kind-hearted individuals who were genuinely dedicated to solving my problem. Many thanks, Meena and Ivan, for your exceptional assistance!

The associate fadi at park royal Home Depot gave me fantastic service by explaining each product in detail and finding the right one for my sister husband for Christmas. I will definitely be recommending my friends to come and get helped by him.
Love the store. Biggest drywall size is 2 by 2 and no long lumber over 8 feet here. And it s dog friendly !

Home Depot Canada is the Canadian unit of the Home Depot and one of Canadas top home improvement retailers. The Canadian operation consists of 182 stores and employs over 28,000 people in Canada. Home Depot Canada has stores in all ten Canadian provinces and serves territorial Nunavut, Northwest Territories, and Yukon through electronic means (Online Sales). The Canadian head office is located in Toronto.
Had a problem with an online order. Spoke with Steph at customer service. She was super helpful, friendly and efficient. She was able to reorder. Thanks Steph! Give this girl a raise.

Aref is 5 star and he deserves it. Aref works at home depot located in North Vancouver/West Vancouver by the Park Royal. Aref has earned a five star review from me through his top excellent attitude, customer care skills, his kindness, his knowledge of product and his best top of the line service. Aref went beyond customers service by applying his knowledge of the product and knowledge of the cause of problem then after diagnosing the situation he offered the best solution and best product for my needs. After I returned home and checked it I found it exactly what Aref had told me was true and the product he sold was the best fit. Mr. Aref, congratulations, you have earned a 5 Star.

I wanna say thank to Jess. The Home Depot- Park royal >> garden part is so lucky to have him. Today I bought a bunch of rose plant and he helped me a lot. Although it was not his responsibility to help me changing the pot, he did his best to help me and make me satisfied. Thank you Jess
I think the price are a little higher than other places one time I went to buy curtains rods the price was double than Walmart store in Capilano Mall,But All staff members are helpful,knowledgeable .

I recently interacted with NEGAR from the customer service team at Home Depot, and I must say she was exceptional. Negar displayed a high level of intelligence and was incredibly helpful throughout my experience. Her knowledge and assistance made my visit pleasant and straightforward. I highly recommend Negar for her outstanding customer service skills.

Faye in the kitchen section was extremely helpful in helping me with moen faucet cartridge replacement. I called the store last Friday, Faye took the call and the cartridge was out of stock, so she said she will follow up with me when the cartridge is in. Surely, she notified me about the cartridge availability 6 days later. So I picked up the cartridge the same day, in talking to her at the store, I found she is also very knowledgeable about the products. Faye demonstrated true excellent customer service in going an extra mile for me. I recommend her and home depot store at West Vancouver. Thank you, Faye!

I bought a bbq today at Park Royal HD and the manager (I did not catch her name) went above and beyond to help me find a bbq and then help me load it into my vehicle. What a lovely and personable woman- so great to receive such great customer service. Thank you!!
I met with one person name Mike p may be. He helped me alot to figure out from problem that  i was facing.Such a nice guy.
I stopped in to look at lights, the Black Friday sales might not be listed as at this past weekend. Sign up for their pro extra rewards program.  Chris is always super nice on Cash!
Great spot for everything you need for home improvement. Super helpful staff too.
Great service, really helpful staff
I was at the garden Center yesterday, bought some plants and flowers, I d like to share, the person who helped me is Sanjay. He is knowledgeable, helpful, respectful and really nice guy.
The store you can find paint, appliances, gardening, etc. High quality and helpful staff.
Amazing crew in rental dept. they assisted with loading and very helpful guys.
Great store, they are very quick to help
Bit of a misnomer, there were in fact no homes for sale here. I did however enjoy the extensive lighting section where I viewed bulbs of all shapes and sizes!

The store is really large and always has a good selection. There is a lot of staff around, and in my experience, have always been really helpful. Tony was super helpful when I needed some help in the tile section . I didn t even need to hunt an employee down; he approached me and even loaded up the tile and helped get it to the car (I was also pushing a stroller). Thanks for being so attentive and helpful Tony!

His name is Javad. An adult Supervisor or Manager in the electrical section. Ive never experienced such a professional and kind consult full of compassion from anyone in similar brands. there is not just Javad but you can find still others like him who easily leave their current work just to help you. The Home Depot is truly Nothing without such rich human resources.
Abraham at the paint desk was incredibly helpful!! He recommended great products and helped us keep costs low. He even gave us a discount on our paint!! Abraham deserves a raise for sure!!!

I had a great experience at this Home Depot. I had a long list of tools I was interested in buying, and there were always employees who were happy to lend their advice and give me help. I am especially thankful to Arif for taking the time to make sure everything I got was exactly what I needed. Thanks again Arif!

Came by yesterday morning to grab some moving supplies. Was greeted by very helpful and friendly staff who helped me find what I was looking for. Amazing service. Especially compared to the experiences I usually have at the Terminal location. I would highly recommend this Home Depot. Great service!

My favorite home depot location. So well organized with staff who is willing to help. I appreciate the older gentleman who helped me out in the tools section when I had no knowledge on tools or what I was looking for, very kind and helpful. After many bad experiences at other locations, I feel satisfied with my service at this home depot.

This is my favorite shopping location. Helpful staff at customer service makes the experience better. One associate named Nisha at customer service helped me find the product I was looking for, and I did not have to feel lost in such a big store. Keep up the good work, folks. Cheers
One stop shop for all you need. Great promo prices time to time.

Great store, came in to buy grip strips for slippery stairs and I was asked twice if I needed assistance! Could be because I am 8 months pregnant, but I like to think this store just genuinely cares. Clean, well stocked, friendly what more could you need?
Good selection and competitive prices. Helpful staff
Weve been doing renovations lately, making several trips a week to this location. Staff are always helpful. The paint weve been using covers nicely and the shades match from trip to trip.
Good prices as always Thank you from APL Restoration Team!
Staff is always extremely helpful and friendly.

Sreek Was an absolute joy and the most helpful person I ve ever worked with in my entire life he was so generous to come and help me out outside putting those huge canvas on my car and help Mr curate and spent so much of his own time being so kind and caring towards me and making it possible for me to carry my stuff downtown that was very very generous of you and the Home Depot for showing such care to me as a customer

Telly, in the paint department, is my go-to man. He is attentive, knowledgeable and friendly. I always leave the store feeling I had more than just a pleasant shopping experience. He seems to rub off on his associates as well. Five stars!
We had a really good experience at this home depot today. Alireza s  customer service was exceptional. He  was very friendly, patient and helpful in helping us find what we were looking for.

The service at this Home Depot is exceptional. We are doing a reno and have got to know the staff by name. They have all gone over and above. I would never have expected that from HD. Well done and thank you.

Ordered an expensive item online and was delayed a couple of weeks which would have set our contractor behind in schedule. With the amazing help of Nisha at the order desk (and her manager Reza), we were able to have it delivered in time for our contractor. I highly recommend Home Depot @ Park Royal for their amazing customer service!

What it lacks in stock from what the bigger Home Depots such as the Terminal location have, it easily makes up for by having way more staff per square foot. In the larger locations, staff can be like ghosts. Here, theres someone in every aisle to help. Yes, I still go to Terminal for lumber and larger items, but this place is great otherwise. Only complaint is the parking lot fills up fast during prime mall time.
I usually dont leave empty-handed. Finding things can be a challenge if you dont like asking for help, but the employees are friendly and know their store very well.
Nareen was very personable with me and helped me choose the best options for my purchase. It was a lovely experience. Thank you Naveen.

Ramona in the the Home decorating department is a wealth of knowledge.  I was looking for reasonable window covering solutions for our cabin.  She was friendly, knowledgeable and gave me great workable solutions for all my window covering needs. Even though jher store was low on product at the time she helped me find stock at other stores, and made sure they (the stores she sent me to) were able to cut the custom blinds I needed for the odd sized windows I had to deal with. Thank you Ramona!!!
Very organize Nice employee Clean and tidy

BEST SERVICE. I am not a very handy man but when I went to this Home depot to look for some small items I required the staff were the MOST HELPFUL  I have ever encountered!  One came down off her ladder to show me bolts I  needed and then the second person spent ages to take me to a completely separate part of the store to help me locate what I was looking for! Darcy went totally out of his way to assist me to find a small item. I never have had such great service. I will be going there all the time from now on. Jon Paul Holt

Bought some light switches tonight that I wanted to price match. The product codes were slightly different (I think there is an online product suffix that is different from the in store one). The employee behind the counter while having to follow policy and have exact matches (which is fair as they have not done the research to understand if they are really the same product or not) still was very nice and patient while I looked up a different local store that had the lower price. Overall really good service and the employee clearly cared about me as the customer.

Reza helped my husband and I by our first BBQ and accessories. He was very knowledgeable and professional. He made our shopping experience very pleasant, so much so that when we were on the fence about buying at a later date from a different store, I decided we should buy from Home Depot just based on customer service we got from Reza. I also noticed that everyone on that day was helpful. An employee named Telis (maybe spelt wrong) was really knowledgeable about patio cleaners. A young man helped us load many bags of play sand we purchased in to our Car. Great job guys and great job to management for properly staffing the store.
Very impressed with the great service, many  people working in the isles to help.. we made this kids play set with what we brought.
Very friendly and professional service

I had great customer service inside.i brought a screw from home I needed for a closet door and a nice man helped me get the exact fit I needed. I also went for paint for my hallways and another friendly employee assisted me in that department withh the right paint I needed. I also got friendly help at the self check out. I regularly shop here!
Really nice location and many goodies not like others home depot definitely they got nicer things and really well organized

Although before I did not have a good shopping experience at this store, Reza and Aidin Soghi the store assistant manager both have changed my previous bad experience to a quite good, happy and the  most pleasant ones by their great knowledge of the store and by their wonderful ways of customer care. They both are very caring, attentive, helpful and supportive. Another staff called Manuel was as awesome as these two guys. Manuel makes your shopping experience more cheerful by his nice sense of humour and his great knowledge of the store. Thank you so much guys!

I went to Home depot Paint department on Sunday and Ibraham was only knowledgeable person in that department. I was so frustrated to find the color that hoping for and he was the only one could help me to find closest color as possible. Thank you Ibraham for caring about your customers and for your good Customer service.
Great location for ur hardware needs

I never cease to be amazed by the knowledge and helpfulness of Home Depot, and the Park Royal store is no exception.  Their politeness and willingness to share their expertise is exceptional, and Im so glad to have the benefit of a facility like this to hand.  Lately its been Rose and Frank and Scott, but in fact Ive only ever met with goodwill and helpfulness by all the staff Ive encountered there.  (Sorry - hope this isnt over the top!)

Employee: Jake Hossain at The Village Park Royal store location went above and beyond to help solve our issue with a recent purchase of a dishwasher. Exceptional service, will definitely be returning to shop for all my home improvement needs; as well as telling everyone I know to shop at The Home Depot as well. Thank you.

This branch of Home Depot is one of the best in the city. Staffs are very knowledgeable and super helpful.  They speak different language such as English, Russian, Pilipino, Farsi, Hindi, Spanish , Kurdish, Kenyan, etc  that makes it easy for elderly to communicate in their own language.  The level of customer service is unbelievable.

Pretty much has everything you need. The staff are friendly and even though it can be a maze to navigate youll end up finding what you need quickly with the help of one of the staff members. Park at the back so youre not bound to a time limit on your parking spot. Itll save you having to battle coffee goers for spots at the front. Its easy to get out of the mall on the back roads too instead of getting stuck in the traffic snarl out front in the Village.

It is an excellent business, very good prices and the best return policy, I would give them more than five star if I could for that. You can shop at The Home Depot knowing that the price is good and if you are not happy with the purchase you can exchange or get refund for it easily.

Wow..!!!  They have the best paints at the best prices, and the most knowledgeable and friendly staff. The manager Bruno really knows his paints and only hires the best for the paint department. Many thanks.

I went there to buy some accessories for my bike, I found a pick resistance lock in there and wanted to buy a repair kit too, when I asked the staff, there was a honest young man who gave me a great advise that it is best to buy the accessories as a package instead of buying them separately, and provided me a affordable kit for bike maintainece.

Oh my God I am so happy I got a new dishwasher thank you Ali he was very nice person and polite and make it very easy for me to choose I was desperate for dishwasher thank you so much I am happy to show up at the store everybody nice and polite and they have very nice sense of humor    anytime I come to this home Depot I leave with a smile on my face the customer service they are so sweet Marina and Rizh and Fadi they have the most wonderful sense of humor I love to come back again thank you guys
The Home Depot is always great. In some cases, the price is more reasonable than in others
I love going to home depot. They usually have what I need. They stock good quality products. I can get ideas for solutions by looking at the selection of things they have.
Friendliest Home Depot in Vancouver area . Love the staff
Rashmi helped me with my order today and was incredibly sweet and very helpful. She went above and beyond and even found me a coupon for my order. Thanks again for being wonderful, Rashmi! :)
We went to paint department and there was ery knowledge freindly lady helped us finding the great paint. Thank you

Having made countless trips to the Home Depot Park Royal location; and having to retrain myself twice as they moved everything in the store around; I can honestly say it is so easy to pick up one item ; like 150 HDX Tall Kitchen bags for $15 tax in! Literally, 3 min elapsed time - now thats quick!

I ordered paint and picked the 2 colors I wanted.  The painting dept. specialist didnt add the colors...  ..lol  what a joke !  I traveled far , now I have to go back and do it again.  The manager gave me a refund of 50% off one of the cans of paint. I appreciated that
Purchased a fridge and stove from home depot. The salesperson was helpful and polite, they had the best pricing and the two units were delivered on time and in great condition. Whats not to like?
ma Naveen in customer service is just wonderful. He helped me put in an order I could not have possibly done by myself.. Many thanks!

Excellent customer service when it counts - dealing with a problem, and making sure it is solved - Thank you Katherine at the Pro Desk, the description speaks for itself!  And a great store with a surprising inventory considering it is in South Park Royal - Bravo!
Friendly, helpful staff with wide selection of products and reasonable prices. Lots of parking.

Staff is great . specially Ari ! He is the Gem and very knowledgeable . we always find what we want to get here. Ask Ari and he will goes far above and makes sure you get your solution ! other staf are as wondrful too. prices are decent. Good culture

For a home depot located attached to a strip mall, this location is not as small as I thought.  Its 2 floors, and makes great use of the space.  Layout is a little confusing,  and not like the larger detached box locations.  Lots of staff around to help you.
Customer service is good. Staff are very nice and helpful. To all the staff, keep up the good job and you all have a good and prosperous  New year!
The guy in homedepot park Royal called Arif is amazing. I think Every store needs an Arif to be superstar.
Really good local HD. Staff are very helpful. Don t expect building supplies (lumber drywall etc though as it s not offered at this location)
Home depo had always nice selection of things if you doing something around house

Great thing there is a Home Depot here. The shape of the store feels alittle awkward but they made great use of the space. They have a huge paint section where they even can mix enamel colors for you. Prices are even through out Home-Depot stores but items on sale can run out faster then the others becasue of the store size bering smaller then the rest.

This is a smaller store but they still have an excellent selection and the staff goes way out of their way to ensure that all customers are looked after for all of their needs . We bring the whole family there every single summer because we love the family Garden.
You can almost find anything to do your house repair, all the staff there are very helpful and respectful. Check-out payment is very easy and cashiers are incredibly amazing.

Love the customer service. Went there for a drill bundle. The bundle is listed in stock but the staff cannot find it. So they sell me the same drill with a free set of 44 piece bit (the bundle has 24 piece bit set).

my go to place for shopping,  always nice to walk around homesense. I  so many beautiful items. I finally bought my Ralph Lauren duvet cover. I have been eyeing it for quite some time. its was on sale and that was the saving grace for my bank account.
Always seem to find something I need in the store. Don t go looking for a big lumber yard, will be disappointed. Parking is usually adequate. Easy to order online and pickup in store.
Amazing service today at the Park Royal store from everyone I came in contact. Helpful, friendly, knowledgeable and engaged. Thank you all.
Just had a great experience at Home Depot West Vancouver , thanks to Kakhan and Rebi . I hope I spelled their names right.
Wonderful customer service
Great location, very attentive staff! Gary help me find exactly what I needed as soon as I walked in the door saved me 20 min of searching. Thanks Gary!!
Friendly knowledgeable staff. Saved me just before they were closing. I believe the custom service associate name was Megan. Thank you and keep up great work
Variety material and different things to select. I was looking for something but when I went there, I found others which were more close to my need.

West van location, was really easy to find what I was looking for. Bryan was super helpful too, my wife and I were looking for electrical light accessories for our project and Byran had some great advice for us, thanks!

The people in the big orange boxes are usually good. Areef in the plumbing,piping area of this depot is great. He knows a lot about the products and their installation. Hes given me some great unique solutions for piping in a beer wart chiller under the sink, in ground sprinklers, advanced pexing, sink installation, faucet cartridge replace, and more. The guy is the bomb. Hey others are likely great too: ive just spend more time in plumbing.
